contentList.content: Utility Spells
A little toolbox for custom non-combat spells and abilities.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialRedWarning"/>WARNING: Inform yourself of the bugs related to this on the Appearance Edit Enhanced mod page!
Conjure Basket Full of Equipment
Conjure a Basket Full of Equipment into your inventory.

This spell conjures a Ghost Basket into your inventory that will disappear after 10 turns. Take your desired items out of the Ghost Basket before that. Everything left in the Ghost Basket will disappear forever.
Basket Full of Equipment Summoned
You summoned a temporary Basket Full of Equipment to your inventory. It and all its contents will disappear soon.
Toggles your veil's visuals on and off, if you have one selected from the mirror or character creation.
Blood Donor
You feel a bit woozy, though you'd feel a lot worse were the feeding involuntary.
The wearer can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Help</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

The wearer can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Help</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and they and their allies within [1] gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EW_BA_STATUS_BLESS">Bless</LSTag>. This can stack with other sources of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Bless</LSTag>.
Heavy Armour Movement Speed Penalty

Reduces <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1] if your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> is 13 or lower while wearing Heavy Splint, Ring Mail or Chain Mail Armour and 15 or lower while wearing Heavy Plate Armour.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> on the current turn, the <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> is lost upon <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">moving</LSTag>.

You give yourself <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> on the current turn, the <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> is lost upon <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">moving</LSTag>.
Dream Shield

Kept from death's door by a brief magical boost. Gained [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and magic can't put you to Sleep.

You gain [1] after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Until the <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> expire you also have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and magic can't put you to Sleep.

The entity can't take <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag> and can only take either an <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> or a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> and loses all <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement</LSTag> when they do so.

Psychically lash out at [1] creature(s), possibly preventing them from taking <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag> and limiting it to using <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> or a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> which also expends all <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement</LSTag>.
Cambion's Cauteriser
This halberd slashes with burning fury dealing an additional [1], but only for its Devil master.

A wicked moment, person, or thing that cannot be slain by sword or spell haunts your mind and flickers in your peripheral vision. You carry it wherever your adventure takes you - or perhaps it carries you.

Your experiences have granted you Expertise in Intimidation, and Darkvision.

When you kill an enemy or score a Critical Hit, all nearby enemies must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw or suffer Bleeding for 2 turns.

Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 Hit Points, the Dark Urge seizes control, pulling you back from the brink of death. You recover [1], but without succeeding a Wisdom Saving Throw you may lose yourself to its will, seeking violence upon any around you.

Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, the Dark Urge seizes control, pulling you back from the brink of death. You recover [1], but without succeeding a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> you may lose yourself to its will, seeking violence upon any around you.
The righteous blade of Helm, precisely where it belongs; buried through the chest of the wicked and the monstrous.
During the Time of Troubles, Helm was forced to slay the goddess Mystra as she tried to return home. Something in this sword's unrelenting line speaks to that grief - a duty completed, at any cost.
Landing an attack on a target heals allies for [1] in a [2] radius around you. This effect can only occur once per turn.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells. This weapon deals an additional [1] to targets <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentrating</LSTag> on a spell.
You gain a +3 bonus to Initiative Rolls and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
You gain an additional +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> when <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Shield of Faith</LSTag> is active.
Faithguard
Entity has an additional +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Shield of Faith</LSTag> being active.

The hawk's keen gaze guides your aim, revealing your prey's vulnerabilities. Targets that have [1]% or fewer <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> take an additional [2] from <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag>.

When you make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attack </LSTag>, it gains a +[1] bonus to the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> and deals additional damage equal to half your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (rounded down). The bonus damage can only occur once per turn.

The cloak infuses your projectile with the piercing force of a hawk's talons. Your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you do an additional [2] damage based off the type of ranged weapon used. This effect can only occur once per turn.
The living wood of the bow reaches out with its own will, guiding your aim and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED">Ensnaring</LSTag> those struck by its arrows.
Comfortable Grip
This weapon deals additional damage equal to half your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

At the start of combat, the crossbow activates, causing bolts of magical energy to lash out. For 3 turns, whenever a creature damages you with an attack, the attacker takes [1]. This can only occur once per turn.

Activate the staff to gain <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> equal to half your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, rounded up. This effect can only occur once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
If a creature hits you with a melee attack, they take [1], equal to half your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>. This effect can only occur once per turn.

When you cast a spell and spend at least 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>, you gain a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> equal to half the spell level cast, rounded up. This bonus lasts 1 turn. This effect can only occur once per turn.
Instantly regain a number of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> equal to half your Sorcerer level, rounded up.
Spell Slinger
You gain a +[1] bonus to your Spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
After using at least 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>, you have a [1]% chance to restore 1 Sorcery Point.
While <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentrating</LSTag>, you gain a +[1] bonus to Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

While your Metamagic ability is active, the amulet floods your being with raw magical energy, allowing you to draw upon its infinite reserves of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>. You can only use this effect once per turn, and once you do, you take [1].
Sorcerous Sand Charge
Endless Well Charge
CC_SORCERER_FREE_CAST_USED

Unleash a wave of shimmering light that washes over all enemies around you. Each creature affected must make a DC15 <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or becomed <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
Once per turn, when you deal damage with a spell, it deals an additional [1] damage. This damage bonus can only trigger once per spell.

In moments of dire need, you clench your fist. A divine spark answers within the gauntlets, allowing you to cast your next spell of up to 4th level without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag>.
Fire a bolt of radiant energy which explodes in a [1] radius upon hitting its target. All allies hit are healed for [2] while enemies hit take [3].

Unleash a spark of celestial lightning in a [1] radius around you. Each creature in the area must make a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [2]. On a save, targets still take half damage.
Heal a target for [1] and remove <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag> and any diseases.
Your healing spells heal all allies in a [1] radius around you for [2] per <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> level.

The wearer and allies within [1] deal an additional [2] damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attacks</LSTag>, and all damage received is reduced by [3]. This bonus is equal to the wearer's <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> minus 1.
Entity deals an additional [1] damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attacks</LSTag> and takes [2] less damage from all sources.
You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells.

Grant a protective stonelike hide to all allies in the targeted area, giving them <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage but reducing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].

Your next <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attack</LSTag> will deal an extra [1]. If the target fails a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, they will also be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Your attacks ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing damage, but you take an additional [1] damage when you take Slashing damage.

Landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a weapon attack fuels your aggression, causing your next weapon attack to deal an additional [1]. This effect can only occur once per turn.
Attacks with this weapon have a [1]% chance to apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MM_SUNDERED">Sundered</LSTag> for 3 turns.
Entity has it's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> reduced by -[1].
When you use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag>, you have a [1]% chance to not expend the charge.

The symbol emits light in a [1] radius, dispelling any darkness. You and all allies who are within this aura reduce the number needed to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking by [2], and gain a +[3] bonus to Attack Rolls.

While within the Aura of Everlight, the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by [1] and you gain a +[2] bonus to Attack Rolls.

When you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Smite_Divine">Divine Smite</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OO_HEAVENLY_HASTE">Heavenly Haste</LSTag> for 2 turns. This effect can only occur once per combat.

Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, when you expend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> charge, your next <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attack</LSTag> will deal an extra [1]. If the target fails a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, they will also be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> for 1 turn.
When you use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag>, you have a [1]% chance to not expend the use.
You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

The amulet's insatiable hunger sinks its teeth into you, forging a shield of dark power from your stolen life force. Until combat ends, you have a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> equal to half your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, rounded up, up to a max of +4.

The amulet's hunger claws at your very being, demanding sacrifice for its power. At the start of combat, you suffer [1] but become armoued with shadowy energy. Until combat ends, you gain a bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> equal to half your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, rounded up, up to a max of +4.

The dagger resonates with the eternal nature of your pact, granting you unique benefits that reflect your chosen pact.

Pact of the Blade - While Pact Weapon is active, your weapon deals an additional [1] and you gain Resistance to Psychic damage. This effect can only occur once per turn.

Pact of the Chain - Your familiars gain an additional +[2] to Armour Class and Attack Rolls, in addition to temporary hit points equal to twice your Warlock level.

Pact of the Tome - You gain +[3] to spell Attack Rolls and Spell Save DC, and your cantrips also deal an additonal [4]. This effect can only occur once per turn.

When struck by an enemy, you can sear your foe with a 3rd-level <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HellishRebuke_3">Hellish Rebuke</LSTag>. This effect can only occur once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
React to your attacker with a 3rd-level <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HellishRebuke_3">Hellish Rebuke</LSTag>.

When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stuns</LSTag> the target for 1 turn.

The horn awakens the divine blood within you. While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are increased by [1] for each of your Barbarian levels.
When you strike with this hammer, there is a [1]% chance that a clap of thunder erupts, dealing [2] to all creatures within [3].

You become a raging embodiment of war itself. While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, you add half your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (rounded down) to damage done with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attacks</LSTag>, and all damage taken is reduced by the same amount. Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is doubled.
Add half of your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (rounded down) to your weapon attack damage.
When you unleash your fury, your allies share in your resilience. You and all allies within [1] gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RR_TITAN_FORT_BUFF_ALLY">Resilient Rage</LSTag> for [2] turns.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, when you damage a hostile creature you gain [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag>.
Haunting Tune
You unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SS_Shout_HauntingTune">Haunting Tune</LSTag> when you have this flute equipped.

The show must go on! Inspired to continue fighting, if you are below 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and take damage, you can channel your artistic passion to heal yourself for [1]+[2] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>. This effect can only occur once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
You deal an additional [1] damage with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Attacks</LSTag> and gain a +[2] bonus to Unarmed Attack Rolls.
Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is increased by [1] and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [2].

When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with this weapon, the target is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag> for [1] turn. This effect can occur only once per combat.

Unleash the blade's dark energy and attempt to pierce a target's heart. The target must make a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [1] for every two Rogue levels you have.
At the start of combat, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VV_OPEN_GAMBIT">Calculated Risk</LSTag> for [1] turns.

Touch a creature within [1] and force them to make a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. On a failed save, the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VV_ASSASSINS_MARK">Mark of Death</LSTag> is applied on them for 10 turns. Your attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the marked creature and your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against the marked creature deal an additional [2] damage.

This creature has been marked for death. The caster who applied this mark has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> against the marked target and deals an additional [1] damage on <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against the marked target.

While in combat and you deal damage with a spell, you have a [1]% chance of being granted a boon for [2] turn based on the damage type dealt. This can only occur once per turn.

Acid: Acidic Form
Thunder: Blurred
Necrotic: False Life
Fire: Heat (for [3] turns)
Lightning: Lightning Charges
Cold: Armor of Agathys
Psychic: Mirror Image
Poison: Envenomed Vitality
Radiant: Shield of Faith
Force: Forceful Repercussion
Gained [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>

You utter a final incantation, channeling the destructive energies of Netheril through your very being. The ancient runes upon the staff ignite with a flash as you unleash a devastating wave of force energy, obliterating yourself and dealing [1] to all creatures within a [2] radius. At character level 12, this damage increases to [3].
Whenever the wearer succeeds on a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against a spell, they regain [1]. This effect can only occur once per turn.
Whenever you deal Fire damage to an enemy, you gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag>.
When you heal a creature, it gains the effect of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> for 1 turn.
War Caster
Usable once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> or once per <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Wildshape_Panther">Wild Shape</LSTag>.
Allies make this <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and Undead make it with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
The wearer deals an additional [1] when dealing[2] with <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>.

When you deal psychic damage to an enemy with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>, they must succed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mentally Fatigue</LSTag>.

When you deal[1] to an enemy with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag>, they must succed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mentally Fatigued</LSTag> for 3 turns.

Attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="MonkWeapon">Monk Weapons</LSTag> and unarmed attacks deal [1], unless their normal damage is higher and scale with your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> instead of your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> if your Dexterity is higher. In addition, you can make <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Target_OneDnD_MartialArts_UnarmedStrike_BonusAction">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Attacks with this weapon have a small chance of wreathing the blade in electricity, dealing [1].

The champion of the Sword Coast, renowned for his heroic deeds and unusual stone eye.

Wyll can see in magical and ordinary darkness up to a range of [1]. If he has the Devil's Sight invocation, he gains Infernal Sight.

A blinded creature can't see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight.

Attack Rolls against the creature have Advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage. Additionally, the creature's attacks incur a -1 penalty if the distance is beyond [1], and a further -1 penalty for every [2] beyond that.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by [1]. This effect can stack.
When you attack or cast a spell, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DrainLife_Base">Drain Life</LSTag> until the end of your turn.

Make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeSpellAttack">melee spell attack</LSTag> against a living creature, dealing [1] and an additional [2] per level of the <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> used. Additionally, when a spell slot is expended you regain[3] equal to the total damage dealt.
Drain Life: Eternal Night

Make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeSpellAttack">melee spell attack</LSTag> against a living creature, dealing [1] and an additional [2] as if you were expending a 1st-level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Additionally, you regain[3] equal to the total damage dealt.
